citoid-citoiddialog-search-label: URL, DOI, ISBN, PMC/PMID, QID, title, or citation
citoid-citoiddialog-search-progress: Ana nema, da fatan za a jira...
citoid-citoiddialog-use-general-error-me: Ba za mu iya yi maka magana ba. Kuna iya ƙirƙirar ɗaya da hannu ta amfani da shafin "{{int:citoid-citoiddialog-mode-manual}}" na sama.
citoid-desc: Yana ba da wuraren shiga tsakanin sabis na citoid da MediaWiki
citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-mess: Wannan bayanin ya ƙunshi hanyar haɗin waje kawai. Kuna iya amfani da maɓallin "{{int:citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-button}}" da ke ƙasa don samar da ingantaccen tsari.
citoid-unknown-error: An sami kuskuren da ba a san shi ba wanda ya hana mu ƙirƙira ambato. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa daga baya.
citoid-wb-pendingdialog-error: An kasa samar da tunani daga wannan shigarwar. Yi amfani da shafin jagora, ko sake gwadawa.
citoid-wb-pendingdialog-message: Samar da bayani a gare ku... da fatan za a jira...
